TopicTitle: Annoying red tint on the lunar lander parts as well as others

Articles.Content: Some parts, including all the lunar lander mod parts, have a weird red tinge to them. Im sure several other people have this problem as well. How can I fix this?

If you would take a moment and search the forums you will find several dozen posts about this issue.

Also, had you taken a moment to read the very first sticky post in this forum, you would have found this: http://kerbalspaceprogram.com/forum/index.php?topic=2877.0

Arrr!

Capt\'n Skunky
